resources.string: Where do you want directions from?

Get started by providing the address at which you are registered to vote.
Looks like we can\'t find your address. Please check that it\'s right and try again.
We couldn\'t read the address you entered. Please check that it\'s right and try again
We couldn\'t find any election information for the address you entered.
Please check that you\'ve got an address entered and try again.
We weren\'t able to get results for the address you entered. Please try again later.
Cannot connect to the Internet. Please check your connection.
Open contacts to select a contact address.
Use current location to search for elections.
No election administration information found for this election.
Google Play services are unavailable. Cannot show locations map, distances, or directions.
Unable to find location for that address.
Hours of operation not found for this location.
Could not find origin point for directions.
